nodes.text: Star Wars Galaxy Magazine 6 is the sixth issue of Star Wars Galaxy Magazine. It was published by Topps in January 1996. The Deluxe Collectors' Edition of issue 6, exclusive to subscribers and comic stores, came polybagged with a Topps Finest chromium Boba Fett promotional trading card and a 1996 Topps Star Wars: Return of the Jedi Widevision promotional card. This issue also included the fold-out poster article Predators for Hire: A Guide to Star Wars Bounty Hunters.
